workerTypes.name: Farmer
workerTypes.description: Works in farms to grow crops, vegetables, fruits, and fibers

workerTypes.name: Baker
workerTypes.description: Bakes bread and other baked goods

workerTypes.name: Cook
workerTypes.description: Prepares meals in restaurants

workerTypes.name: Street Food Cook
workerTypes.description: Specializes in Indian street food like samosa, vada, pakora, and poha

workerTypes.name: Restaurant Cook
workerTypes.description: Prepares complex restaurant dishes like dosa, idli, and biryani

workerTypes.name: Sweet Maker
workerTypes.description: Crafts Indian sweets like rasogulla, ladoo, jalebi, and halwa

workerTypes.name: Barman
workerTypes.description: Brews beer and distills whiskey

workerTypes.name: Barista
workerTypes.description: Expert in preparing hot beverages, particularly tea and coffee

workerTypes.name: Carpenter
workerTypes.description: Crafts furniture and wooden structures

workerTypes.name: Woodworker
workerTypes.description: Processes timber into lumber and planks

workerTypes.name: Grain Processor
workerTypes.description: Mills grains into flour or processes rice into flattened rice

workerTypes.name: Oil Presser
workerTypes.description: Extracts oil from groundnuts, mustard seeds, sesame, and coconuts

workerTypes.name: Sugar Processor
workerTypes.description: Refines sugarcane into sugar

workerTypes.name: Dairy Worker
workerTypes.description: Processes milk into butter, paneer, cheese, and other dairy products

workerTypes.name: Lumberjack
workerTypes.description: Harvests timber and wood from forests

workerTypes.name: Woodcutter
workerTypes.description: Cuts trees and processes wood

workerTypes.name: Miner
workerTypes.description: Extracts ore, coal, gold, and other minerals from mines

workerTypes.name: Blacksmith
workerTypes.description: Forges tools, weapons, and metal goods

workerTypes.name: Smelter
workerTypes.description: Smelts ore into metal ingots

workerTypes.name: Metalworker
workerTypes.description: Works with metal to create various products

workerTypes.name: Goldsmith
workerTypes.description: Crafts jewelry and gold items

workerTypes.name: Tailor
workerTypes.description: Creates clothing and garments

workerTypes.name: Weaver
workerTypes.description: Weaves thread into cloth and yarn

workerTypes.name: Spinner
workerTypes.description: Spins cotton and other fibers into thread

workerTypes.name: Shoemaker
workerTypes.description: Manufactures shoes and footwear

workerTypes.name: Mason
workerTypes.description: Works with bricks and stone for construction

workerTypes.name: Glassblower
workerTypes.description: Creates glass products through glassblowing

workerTypes.name: Artisan
workerTypes.description: Skilled craftsperson creating high-quality goods

workerTypes.name: Herder
workerTypes.description: Raises and cares for livestock

workerTypes.name: Animal Herder
workerTypes.description: Manages dairy animals, ensures milk production and animal welfare

workerTypes.name: General Worker
workerTypes.description: Performs general labor tasks

workerTypes.name: Apprentice
workerTypes.description: Young worker learning a trade from skilled workers (typically age 12-17)

workerTypes.name: Doctor
workerTypes.description: Provides medical care and treatment

workerTypes.name: Nurse
workerTypes.description: Assists doctors and provides patient care

workerTypes.name: Teacher
workerTypes.description: Educates students in schools

workerTypes.name: Merchant
workerTypes.description: Trades and sells goods

workerTypes.name: Banker
workerTypes.description: Manages financial transactions and banking operations

workerTypes.name: Philosopher
workerTypes.description: Gives meaning to life, might be positive but sometimes can create negative effects as well.
